title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 733.6 - Change of media for existing records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 733.6 - Change of media for existing records

State Regulations

Those records prepared and maintained under previous
regulations in a paper medium, and whose remaining retention period falls
within the life expectancy range of any of the media detailed in section
733.4
of this Part, may be
converted to that medium at the public utility or municipality's option, provided the applicable certification processes described in section
733.5
of this Part are observed
and an audit referencing capability is maintained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
733.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
